about_the_game:
Begin your epic adventure as you "Journey Up" towards the sky

Begin your journey deep in a mine with no memories in your databanks or directives in your programming. The only thing you see is a glimmer of light far above you beneath a collapsed mine shaft.

Each jump and hand hold takes you closer to your goal. Explore different biomes and face different challenges as you journey up.

Explore diverse biomes

Each biome presents new sites and challenges on your way to the top.

Singleplayer or online multiplayer

Whether playing offline on your own or online with upto 4 players you can be sure to have good latency with our cloud based servers.

Realistic body physics

We model the whole body with our physics system so you can swing with your arms or slide things with your feet and push buttons by physically slapping them.

2 Game modes

Play on easy mode and you can respawn at your highest checkpoint

Play on speedrun mode to disable checkpoints and try for the fastest finish time.

Leaderboards

Compare individual zone times and whole game complete times with your friends on steam leaderboards.

Features

  • VR or Desktop Mode.

  • Motion controls or Keyboard Mouse or Gamepad support.

  • Full body physics simulation.

  • Pull yourself onto ledges by pushing your hands down and raising your legs.

Whether adventuring solo or with up to 4 players online, keep journeying upwards... and don't look down!

Begin your epic adventure as you "Journey Up" towards the sky

Begin your journey deep in a mine with no memories in your databanks or directives in your programming. The only thing you see is a glimmer of light far above you beneath a collapsed mine shaft.

Each jump and hand hold takes you closer to your goal. Explore different biomes and face different challenges as you journey up.

Explore diverse biomes

Each biome presents new sites and challenges on your way to the top.

Singleplayer or online multiplayer

Whether playing offline on your own or online with upto 4 players you can be sure to have good latency with our cloud based servers.

Realistic body physics

We model the whole body with our physics system so you can swing with your arms or slide things with your feet and push buttons by physically slapping them.

2 Game modes

Play on easy mode and you can respawn at your highest checkpoint

Play on speedrun mode to disable checkpoints and try for the fastest finish time.

Leaderboards

Compare individual zone times and whole game complete times with your friends on steam leaderboards.

  • VR or Desktop Mode.

  • Motion controls or Keyboard Mouse or Gamepad support.

  • Full body physics simulation.

  • Pull yourself onto ledges by pushing your hands down and raising your legs.

Whether adventuring solo or with up to 4 players online, keep journeying upwards... and don't look down!
name: Journey Up

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2500K CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • VR Support: (OpenXR) Meta Quest / Rift, Valve Index, Pico 3 / 4 supported
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Gain sentience and climb up out of the mines and beyond on your own or online with up to 4 players. Play with checkpoints or without for a more tense experience. Supports VR and desktop monitor mode. Can you reach the top?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Ukrainian, Japanese
